metadata.dc:author: Morera Pérez, C
Fontal Alvarez, M
metadata.dc:description: The AA. report a case of primary cholesteatoma of the petrous apex. These seldom cases show at the beginning trigeminal symptomatology. They are treated through a middle fossa approach. Survey of the literature.
metadata.dc:title: Epidermoide de punta de peñasco.
[Epidermoid of the petrous apex].
